question: A man rows upstream 36 km and downstream 48 km taking 6 hrs each time. The speed of the current is :
explanation:
Rate downstream of boat $latex = \\frac{48}{6}  = 8\\:km/hr&s=1$
Rate upstream $latex = \\frac{36}{6}  = 6\\:km/hr&s=1$
âˆ´ Speed of current $latex = \\frac{1}{2}(Rate\\: downstream - Rate\\: upstream)&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{1}{2}(8-6)=1&s=1\\:km/hr$
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
